english_example_sentence: If we learned this difficult subject, the teacher would congratulate us.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы мы выучили эту сложную тему, учитель поздравил бы нас.
turkish_example_sentence: Bu zor konuyu öğrensek, öğretmen bizi tebrik eder.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Bu zor konuyu ______, öğretmen bizi tebrik eder.
